message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
I think it's fairer for both of us to get closer to a 50/50 split. Let's see if you accept this offer.
Okay Bob, let's try this again. I'll take $55, and you get $45. Remember, the value decreases every round, so don't wait too long!
